author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chengdu Taihe Health Technology Group to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on April 10
text:
April 2 (Reuters) - Chengdu Taihe Health Technology Group Inc Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 0.8 yuan(before tax)/10 shares and distribute 3 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 9
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 10 and the dividend will be paid on April 10
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/ed62vf
